angle_range.description: Range in radians for the random fixed angle of the uniform current.

time_factor_range.description: Angular velocity factor (rad/s) for rotating the current field over time.

periods_range.description: Range for the spatial periods of the sinusoidal waves.

gains_range.description: Range for the amplitude gains of the sinusoidal components.

phases_range.description: Range for the initial phases of the waves.

time_freq_range.description: Range of frequencies (rad/s) for the temporal evolution of wave phases.

number_range.description: Range for the number of vortices to generate in the field.

time_velocity_range.description: Range of velocities (m/s) for the temporal displacement of vortex centers.

number_range.description: Range for the number of logarithmic flows to generate.
Range for the number of Gaussian swirls.

scales_range.description: Minimum value for the scale (standard deviation) of the swirls. The maximum is computed as 0.5 * scenario size.

gains_range.description: Range for the gain (strength and direction) of each swirl.

time_velocity_range.description: Range of velocities (m/s) for the temporal displacement of the swirl centers.

spacing_range.description: Range for the spacing between vortices in the Kármán vortex street.

strength_range.description: Range for the strength (intensity) of the vortices.

phase_range.description: Range for the initial phase of the vortex street.

wake_center_range.description: Range for the vertical position of the wake center.

time_freq_range.description: Frequency (rad/s) for phase shift evolution over time.

decay_scale_factor.description: Factor (multiplies the Y size of the scenario) for the decay scale of the current from the coast.

period_range.description: Range in seconds for the tidal period.

phase_range.description: Range for the initial tidal phase.

a_factor_range.description: Range for factor 'a' (velocity gradient). Normalized by scenario size.

cross_range.description: Range for the cross velocity component (v).

A_factor.description: Amplitude factor multiplying the base velocity.

epsilon_range.description: Range for epsilon parameter, controlling double gyre oscillation.

time_freq_range.description: Frequency (rad/s) for the temporal evolution of the gyre pattern.

axis_choices.description: Axis along which the Gaussian jet will be aligned.

sigma_factor_range.description: Range for the factor (multiplies scenario Y size) controlling jet width (sigma).

center_factor_range.description: Range for the factor (multiplies scenario Y size) controlling jet center position.

amplitude_factor.description: Amplitude factor multiplying the base velocity at the jet center.

mouth_x_factor_range.description: Range for the factor (multiplies scenario X size) for river mouth X position.

mouth_y_factor.description: Fixed factor (multiplies scenario Y size) for river mouth Y position.

spread_factor_range.description: Range for the factor (multiplies scenario X size) controlling flow angular spread.

decay_range.description: Range for the velocity decay exponent with distance.

spread_amplitude_factor.description: Amplitude factor controlling intensity of the outflow current at the mouth.

modes_range.description: Range for the number of Fourier modes used to generate turbulence noise.

phases_range.description: Range for random phases of the modes.

gains_range.description: Range for the amplitude gains of the modes.

time_freq_range.description: Range of frequencies (rad/s) for the temporal evolution of turbulence phases.
